name: Great 1000 Miles Rally
overview: 1000 Miglia is a sprite-based isometric racing game based around the historical italian endurance race from Brescia to Rome and back, which took place between 1927 to 1957. It features classic cars from Ferrari, Alfa Romeo, Mercedes Benz and more. Gameplay is similar to other isometric racers of that era, e.g. World Rally Championship.
